name: react-demo

scripts.build:wasm: cd ../.. && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o examples/react-demo/public/gofetch.wasm ./cmd/wasm && cp $(go env GOROOT)/lib/wasm/wasm_exec.js examples/react-demo/public/

description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.
